scripts.script: INSERT INTO @target.ngv.CustomLabels (CustomLabelID, EmployerID, LabelKey, Singular, Plural, LabelLevel, IsSingularOnly) SELECT CustomLabelID, EmployerID, LabelKey, Singular, Plural, LabelLevel, IsSingularOnly FROM [@source].[ngv].[CustomLabels] WHERE EmployerID IS NULL

UPDATE dbo.Brands Set url = 'http://performance.local.neogov.net/' where BrandID = 10
UPDATE dbo.Brands Set url = 'http://hrcloud.local.neogov.net/' where BrandID = 20
